TASK: Craft an item of type: birch_button
inventory=[{"type": "stone_slab", "quantity": 9, "index": 10}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 37, "index": 13}, {"type": "endermite_spawn_egg", "quantity": 16, "index": 14}, {"type": "oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 25, "index": 26}, {"type": "oak_leaves", "quantity": 6, "index": 27}, {"type": "iron_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "leather_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 38, "index": 38}, {"type": "fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 39, "index": 39}, {"type": "green_wool", "quantity": 26, "index": 40}, {"type": "white_banner", "quantity": 13, "index": 42}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 10, "index": 44}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a birch_button, I need to place birch_planks in the crafting grid. I will move the birch_planks from slot 45 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: birch_button
inventory=[{"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stone_slab", "quantity": 9, "index": 10}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 37, "index": 13}, {"type": "endermite_spawn_egg", "quantity": 16, "index": 14}, {"type": "oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 25, "index": 26}, {"type": "oak_leaves", "quantity": 6, "index": 27}, {"type": "iron_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "leather_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 38, "index": 38}, {"type": "fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 39, "index": 39}, {"type": "green_wool", "quantity": 26, "index": 40}, {"type": "white_banner", "quantity": 13, "index": 42}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 10, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that the birch_button has been crafted, I will move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
